Phobia watched the scanners as something entered the atmosphere, the 
heat it gave off was hard to miss. Scanners showed no activity before 
it entered so logic dictated that it had to be mechanical. Size and 
shape were undetectable but he knew the object wasn't very large.

"Computer, calculate landing coordinates for object." he knew his 
calculations wouldn't be accurate, a ship could easily change 
directions and land anywhere. Especially a cloaked one.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RgDaN@a... wrote:
> A small Star hopper comes down towards earth as to red eyes 
glare "computer  
> enter stealth mode we don't want to draw any unneeded attention." 
As the ship 
> cloaks  itself "Is the one I seek here or is this just another wild 
goose 
> chase." The target is at vector  6 moving due east. You need to to 
choose a 
> new mode "What kind is that ?" 
> A beastmode.
> 
> As the Hopper sets down in far off region the burning red eyes 
close "stay 
> cloaked and  send out 6 drones have them select the strongest 
creatures on 
> this planet and copy and combine there DNA and show me the test 
results "Soon 
> I shall awaken."  
> 
> As the six drones leave each scanning all the  predatory creatures 
it come 
> across. 
> 
> "Excellent we have a winner"  Beastmode is created junction to 
robot mode in 
> 4 3 2 1.
